entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
